CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Date_Qualified__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Date_Moved_to_Proposal__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Date_Moved_to_Negotiations__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Date_Moved_to_Approved__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Date_Moved_to_Closed_Won_Lost__c ), 0, 1)
CustomField.label: Number of Stages Reached
